settings.ordersreport.subject: Reporte de Ordenes

settingstext.admindiscount.text: <span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica; color: #666644; font-size: 20px; -webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 2px; -webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 2px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Descuentos y c&oacute;digos promocionales disponibles pronto!</span><br /> </span>
settingstext.extradetail.text: <p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: white;"><span style="color: black; font-size: 14px; font-family: tahoma;">Informaci&oacute;n adicional</span> </p>
settingstext.gatewaymsg.text: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <head> <style type="text/css"> .style1 { font-family: Tahoma; font-size: small; } </style> </head> <body> <p class="style1"> El pago por transferencia requiere que se deposite<span lang="en-us"> </span>el total de la orden<br /> en las cuentas de [Template:NombreTienda]. Información detallada de<br /> cómo hacer el pago se enviara por correo electrónico cuando se termine<br /> el proceso de compra </p> </body> </html>
settingstext.jqueryaccordion.code: <script language='javascript' type='text/javascript'> jQuery('#NBStoreAccordion').accordion({ active: false, header: '.nbstoremenuhead', autoheight: false, navigation: true, event: 'mouseover' }); </script>

settingstext.order.text.template: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <head> <style type="text/css"> .indent { margin-left: 40px; } </style> <title></title> </head> <body> <p> <style type="text/css"> body table td { font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: 13px; color: #444444; } .emailheader { font-family: Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #656565; } .cartheader { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } .style1 { background-color: #656565; font-family: Tahoma; } .style2 { font-weight: bold; } .style3 { font-family: Tahoma; font-size: small; } .style4 { font-family: Tahoma; font-size: small; font-weight: bold; } .style5 { font-family: Tahoma; } .style6 { font-family: Tahoma; font-weight: bold; } .style7 { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Tahoma; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } .style8 { font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #656565; } </style> <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%"> <tr> <td> <span lang="en-us"><font class="style8">ORDEN</font></span> </td> <td valign="top"> <strong><span lang="en-us" class="style5">Numero de Orden</span><span class="style5">: </span></strong><span class="style5">[Order:Order<span lang="en-us">Number</span>] <br /> <strong><span lang="en-us">Fecha de Orden</span>:</strong> [Order:OrderDate] </span> </td> </tr> </table> </p> <p> <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%"> <tr> <td valign="top" class="style5"> <span class="style2" lang="en-us">Enviar Factura A:</span><br /> [BAddress:AddressName] <br /> [BAddress:Address1] <br /> [BAddress:Address2] <br /> [BAddress:PostalCode] [BAddress:City] <br /> [BAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [BAddress:Country] <br /> [BAddress:Phone1] <br /> [BAddress:Phone2]<br /> [Order:Email] </td> <td align="right" valign="top"> <strong><span lang="en-us" class="style5">Enviar Producto A</span><span class="style5">:</span></strong><span class="style5"> <br /> [SAddress:AddressName] <br /> [SAddress:Address1] <br /> [SAddress:Address2] <br /> [SAddress:PostalCode] [SAddress:City] <br /> [SAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [SAddress:Country] <br /> [SAddress:Phone1] <br /> [SAddress:Phone2] </span> </td> </tr> </table> </p> <p> <table border="0" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"> <tr valign="top"> <td align="center" class="style7"> Items </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> <span lang="en-us">P<span class="style1">recio</span></span><span class="style5"> </span> </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> <span lang="en-us">C<span class="style1">an</span></span><span class="style5"> </span> </td> <td align="center" class="style7"> Total </td> <caption class="style5"> [Order:DetailRows]<tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> <span lang="en-us" class="style5">Envio</span> </td> <td align="right" class="style5"> [Order:ShippingCost] </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3" class="style6"> Total </td> <td align="right" class="style5"> <strong>[Order:Total]</strong> </td> </tr> </table> </p> <p> <span class="style4">Información Adicional</span><span class="style3" lang="en-us">:</span> <br class="style3" /> <span class="style3">[Order:NoteMsg] </span> </p> </p> </body> </html>
settingstext.ordershipped.email: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">Su orden ha sido validada</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">[Template:order.email.template]</span></p>
settingstext.ordervalidated.email: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">Su orden ha sido validada</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">[Template:order.email.template]</span></p>
settingstext.paymentFAIL.text: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">Pago <strong>NO</strong> validado. Se&nbsp;proceder&aacute;&nbsp;a cancelar la orden</span></p>
settingstext.paymentinprocess.text: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">Pago de la orden se esta procesando</span></p>
settingstext.paymentOK.email: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">Pago de orden recibido</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">[Template:order.email.template]</span></p>
settingstext.paymentSECURITY.text: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">Violaci&oacute;n&nbsp;de seguridad</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;">Para mayor&nbsp;informaci&oacute;n&nbsp;ponerse en contacto con el administrador</span></p>
settingstext.paymentunverified.email: <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 14px;"><strong>*** Pago NO verificado ***</strong></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">[Template:order.email.template]</span></p>
settingstext.productlimit.text: <strong><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">El limite de productos se ha alcanzado<br /> </span></strong><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;"> Para agregar un nuevo producto tiene que remover alguno de los actuales</span>
settingstext.productlist2.template: <table width="100%" height="100" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="100" height="100" align="center"> <a href="[TAG:LINK]">[TAG:IMAGE]</a></td> <td width="100%" valign="top"> <h1>[TAG:EDITLINK][TAG:SUMMARY]</h1> <font color="#7B7B7B">A partir de :</font> <strong>[TAG:FROMPRICE] &#8364; TTC</strong> <font color="#7B7B7B"><em>selon disponibilit&#233;</em></font></td> <td valign="top" align="center"> <h2>[TAG:MANUFACTURER]</h2> </td> <td valign="top" align="center"> <h2>[TAG:PRODUCTREF]</h2> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
settingstext.ups.tracktemplate: <a href="http://wwwapps.ups.com/WebTracking/processInputRequest?sort_by=status&amp;tracknums_displayed=1&amp;TypeOfInquiryNumber=T&amp;loc=en_US&amp;InquiryNumber1=[TAG:TRACKINGCODE]&amp;track.x=0&amp;track.y=0" target="_blank"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">N</span></a><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">umero de&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: tahoma; font-size: 13px;">Gu&iacute;a</span>

NB_Store_SQLReportInfo.SQL: select top 10 OrderDate,OrderNumber,AddressName as [Name],convert(decimal(16,2),Total) As Total, OrderStatusText as Status from dbo.NB_Store_Orders as O inner join dbo.NB_Store_OrderStatus as OS on OS.OrderStatusID = O.OrderStatusID and Lang= 'XX' inner join dbo.NB_Store_Address as AD on AD.AddressID = O.BillingAddressID where OrderNumber != '' and O.PortalID = @PortalID order by OrderDate Desc
select count(OrderID) as [Order Count] from dbo.NB_Store_Orders where PortalID = @PortalID and OrderNumber != ''
select convert(decimal(16,2),sum(Total)) as [Order Total] from dbo.NB_Store_Orders where Portalid = @PortalID and OrderNumber != ''
select count(ProductID) as [Product Count] from dbo.NB_Store_Products where Archived = 0 and IsDeleted = 0 and PortalID = @PortalID
